mapper.select: SELECT jnl02_cont_id as jnl02ContId /** 체결ID */ , jnl02_seq as jnl02Seq /** 순번 */ , jnl02_drcr_type as jnl02DrcrType /** 차대구분 */ , jnl02_repr_acnt_cd as jnl02ReprAcntCd /** 대표계정코드 */ , jnl02_amt as jnl02Amt /** 금액 */ FROM jnl02_journal_tmp WHERE jnl02_cont_id = #{contId} ORDER BY jnl02_drcr_type desc, jnl02_seq
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN jnl02_drcr_type = 'D' THEN jnl02_amt ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN jnl02_drcr_type = 'C' THEN jnl02_amt ELSE 0 END) FROM jnl02_journal_tmp WHERE jnl02_cont_id = #{contId}
